title: ALLOW ONE FOR ALL CUSTOM GAMES!!!
body:
Some of us don't like to play SR and don't want to be restricted to one map

On PBE you could make custom One for All games on any map, please allow this :)

replies.body: One For All custom games are totally allowed. You can play any map you want. ^_^b

> [{quoted}](name=L4T3NCY,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=jGLqfnxx,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-10-15T17:39:39.285+0000)
>
> One For All custom games are totally allowed. You can play any map you want. ^_^b

PRAISE BE! <3
how did you not know o.o

> [{quoted}](name=Gin Gomi,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=jGLqfnxx,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-10-16T00:45:23.674+0000)
>
> how did you not know o.o

They weren't enabled when OfA first hit.
You can on EUW at least. I did some Dominion and Howling Abyss.
I'm with ya, one for all on SR is boring as hell. If i wanted to play SR I would play Normals or Ranked.

> [{quoted}](name=Dryad Soraka,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=jGLqfnxx,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-10-15T09:43:14.607+0000)
>
> Some of us don't like to play SR and don't want to be restricted to one map
> 
> On PBE you could make custom One for All games on any map, please allow this :)

You mean you can't this time?  That was the _**entire point**_ of the original OFA!  I don't know anybody who *didn't* do customs on the Howling Abyss.
